page.title: 14Dymchurch Funfair
page.content: A big tourist attraction is Dymchurch funfair.It is owned by Mr Marks and has been passed down from generation to generation in his family.His son & brother both work at the fair.In the high tourist season 24 workers are employed.Thousands of people visit the fair every year,mostly holiday- makers.The fair is open from Easter to September from 10 a.m.-10 p.m. every day.The oldest rides are The Galloper & The Cakewalk.The newest is The Mys- tic Swing.The rides are powered by electricity.The most expensive amuse- ment is The Ghost Train at 40p,the cheapest:The Helter-Skelter at 10p. The most popular rides for 10-15 yr olds are The Ghost Train,The Dodgems & The Galloper.For the children of Dymchurch the funfair is an adventur- ous playground,when tourism is poor.
